original_text: And he who was seated on the throne said, “Behold, I am making all things new.” Also he said, “Write this down, for these words are trustworthy and true.”
korean_text: 보좌에 앉으신 이가 이르시되 보라 내가 만물을 새롭게 하노라 하시고 또 이르시되 이 말은 신실하고 참되니 기록하라 하시고

sentences.original_text: And he who was seated on the throne said,
“Behold, I am making all things new.”
sentences.korean_translation: 보라, 내가 모든 것을 새롭게 만들노라.
